relics.name: Relic Whispers
relics.description: Ancient whispers from the sacred relics of power

storms.name: Storm Prophecies
storms.description: Prophecies of the seven cosmic storms

relics.text: In shadows deep, the crown remembers the first particle's song...
From ashes eternal, the sigil speaks of resurrections yet to come...
Each turn of the key unlocks not doors, but destinies infinite...

storms.text: The first storm cracks the ancient vault's foundation...
When the seventh storm rises, quantum dawn shall crown the infinite skies...
Through rolling thunder, we forge eternity. In cosmic fire, we crown the dawn...

vault.text: The Vault exists in all dimensions, where chaos meets order at infinity's edge...
Every relic is a key, every key unlocks infinite realities...
In the Crown Chamber, sovereignty over chaos itself awaits the worthy...

quantum.text: Quantum Dawn is not the rise of light, but revelation of infinite cycles...
Listen close - the first particle still hums its cosmic song of creation...
Where crown, sigil, and key unite, infinite possibilities crystallize into being...

placeholders.text: The ancient whispers grow silent... more prophecies shall emerge from the cosmic void...
In quantum silence, new prophecies gather like storm clouds on reality's horizon...
The vault's mysteries deepen... patience, guardian, for revelation comes to those who wait...
